system.description:
Reverent undertakers, eager bone-setters, or cold-hearted executioners who weild the power of the undead to do their bidding.

Weapons: Dagger, Scythe

Armor: Leather armor

Hit Points: 1d4 per level

Languages. You know one rare language.

Necrotic Reap. You can cast touch spells through a scythe.

Add +1 spellcasting bonus to touch spells when doing so.

Claim Undead. 1/Day you can seize control of any number of undead not controlled by you. Their total LV cannot exceed your own. Undead make a DC 12 CHA check to resist.

Spellcasting. You can cast grave warden spells you know.

You may choose three tier 1 spells from the grave warden spell list.

Each time you gain a level, you choose new grave warden spells to learn based on the @UUID[Compendium.unnatural-selection.documents.JournalEntry.4G9LZfiREUuQViCf.JournalEntryPage.ph9oSzLsMhZI6kjB]{Grave Warden Spells Known} table.

Add your constitution bonus when casting grave warden spells. The DC is 10 + the spell’s tier.

If you fail a spellcasting check, you can’t cast that spell again until you complete a rest.

If you roll a natural 1 on a spellcasting check, you must also roll on the corresponding Necrotic Mishap table for the spell’s tier.
